name: Oluwadurotimi Okediji
description: Our CEO, Oluwadurotimi Okediji,a visionier and ambitious man, he beliefs in impactation He brings his zeal for fusion cuisines in the food legends product, pioneering cross-cultural culinary connections.

name: Olawale Micheal Juwon
description: Our TL, Micheal, as he is affectionately referred to by his colleagues -Tech Man, All he loves doing is to play with server, network and physical computing. He belifs that the food legends robot is coming. As he puts it in his own words, Everything that runs, wins, and everything that stays, pays!

name: Ige Oluwabunmi
description: Blessed with the most discerning gustatory sense, Bunmi, our CFO, personally ensures that every dish that we serve meets her exacting tastes. Our chefs dread the tongue lashing that ensues if their dish does not meet his exacting standards. She lives by her motto, You click only if you survive my lick.

name: Oluwafolakemi
description: Award winning pioneer of the food legends product, a wide International experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, she specializes in creating mouthwatering diet experiences.she is an endowed entrepreneur

name: Iyiola Grace
description: Member of the food legends product, knowledgibile and  experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, she specializes in creating mouthwatering diet experiences.she is  endowed with writing about foods

name: Iyeni Mayowa
description: Member of the food legends product, knowledgibile and  experience having worked with food + money, she specializes in creating savings plan on diet.

name: Ajao Joshua
description: Member of the food legends product, knowledgibile and  experienc, a chemical engineer surfing things with the food legends, though a recruit who argues not to be (lol). He is skilfull and passionate.
